name: @wxyc/backend-services
description: All necessary app services for the WXYC flowsheet backend

scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.db:start: docker compose -f dev_env/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env --profile dev up -d; docker attach wxyc-db-init
scripts.db:stop: docker compose -f dev_env/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env --profile dev down db -v --remove-orphans
scripts.ci:env: npm run ci:build && sh -c 'COMPOSE="docker compose -f dev_env/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env --profile ci" && $COMPOSE up -d ci-db && $COMPOSE up ci-db-init && $COMPOSE up -d auth backend'
scripts.ci:test: DB_PORT=${CI_DB_PORT:-5433} PORT=${CI_PORT:-8081} BETTER_AUTH_URL=${CI_BETTER_AUTH_URL:-http://localhost:8083/auth} dotenvx run -f .env -- jest --config jest.config.json --runInBand --coverage
scripts.ci:testmock: npm run ci:env && npm run ci:test && npm run ci:clean
scripts.drizzle:generate: read -p "Enter migration name (optional): " MIGRATION_NAME && dotenvx run -f .env -- drizzle-kit generate --config 'drizzle.config.ts' --name "$MIGRATION_NAME"

author: AyBruno
